    Megatron and Hell Beast both watched the battle at the Ark. It was 
interesting, time had no been effected at all....
    "This would be an excellent time to go and finish Kitkat." Hell Beast 
said, looking to his commrad. Megatron seemed very perky with the destruction 
of the Ark.
    "We need to find her first. Dont worry....my plan is falling into place. 
Soon, the Maximals will be no more, and the Predacons wil lrule this planet!" 
He sneered, looking at the image of Kitkat on the computer screen. He had 
been looking at her history from the old records. Somehow, he couldnt stop 
thinking about her.....he was fascinated by her.
    Hell Beast turned the image off, and gloated, "I could have found her by 
now!" He said, stood up, and paced the cramed room.
    Waspinator, Gremlin, and the two remianing Maximal counterparts watched, 
hoping for a fight. The minions had nothing better to do....now that the Ark 
was destroyed.
    Megatron narrowed his eyes, "Hell Beast.....you need not concern yourself 
with my affairs. You will get what you want, I guarentee it. All I ask is 
that you cooperate."
    Hell Beast said nothing and exited the chamber, with Gremlin trotting 
loyally behinde him. Megatron sighed at his departure and returned the image 
of Kitkat to the screen. And watched.

    Nighteyes walked around the base...it was quite. HAd she gotten lost? Was 
this Kitkats base? She walked into what she thought was the bridge and looked 
around..."Hello? Commander Kitkat? I want to join you....? I can tell you 
where Megatron is? Hellllllo?!"

    Aracnia ghasped with the destruction of the Ark. She didnt understand why 
time hadnt be altered.....like when Megatron had tried the same manuver back 
in the old war. She quickly went to the monitor and located Cyberclaw, 
"Listen, I need you to go to the Ark and find out what the hell is going on. 
Your the most skilled in covert tasks like these....and staying out of sight. 
Do you think your up to it?" She asked, because she wanted Cyberclaw on her 
side.
